doc: A GPU Implementation of Moving Least Squares (MLS) for Unorganized Clouds?

Does PCL have such an implementation? I have been searching for open source projects, and all of there is one existing project and it is designed for organized point clouds (using pixel wise search instead of a kd-tree/oct-tree)

I have to fuse data from 4 Kinects. Even after downsampling (to 1cm) and using a about a 5cm search space, and using the OpenMP optimization, the processing time is **unacceptable**. It runs at about 0.5Hz.
If there is no such implementation, I would like to see if it is worth rolling out my own.
